Buffalo.Villa Maria College:
Villa Maria College is a small, private, Roman Catholic liberal arts college in Buffalo, New York within the Diocese of Buffalo. It was founded in 1961 by the Felician Sisters, and is sponsored by the Our Lady of Hope Province of North America Villa Maria College provides students with the premier student-centered experience in Western New York where enrolled students learn and grow within a diverse population, and a culture that lives the values of truth, charity, and unity.


== Academics ==
Villa Maria offers bachelor's and associate degrees in the arts, sciences, and business.
